title: Google Nexus 8 tablet could be in the works after all | Trusted Reviews
description:
![nexus 9](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

**We’ve been inundated with leaks and rumours about new Nexus phones, but it’s
been quiet on the tablet front so far.**

Fortunately, that trend has seemingly been cut short thanks to a new leak that
suggests Google is working on a new Nexus tablet after all.

A mysterious device has apparently turned up on Geekbench3, one of the most
popular smartphone benchmarking software services. The readout was first
spotted by [Mobipicker](http://www.mobipicker.com/google-nexus-8-tablet-
benchmarked-may-come-soon-with-8-core-processor/).

What’s interesting is that it’s actually not so mysterious after all – the
device is conspicuously named as “Nexus 8”.

That’s not a device that currently exists amongst Google’s Nexus arsenal, but
the moniker does fit with the company’s naming convention.

What’s more, last year we heard rumours that Google was working on a [Nexus 8
tablet](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/google-nexus-8-still-en-route-
despite-i-o-silence). Instead, the company launched the tepidly-received
[Nexus 9](https://www.trustedreviews.com/nexus-9-review).

This latest leak could be proof that a Nexus 8 tablet really does exist. But
what will it look like?

## Latest

  * [ ![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-reviews-placeholder-3.svg) Credit: Photo by Raúl Nájera on Unsplash 

### How to vote in the US midterms 2018: Alexa has the answer

](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/alexa-vote-us-mid-term-
elections-2018-3613635 "How to vote in the US midterms 2018: Alexa has the
answer")

  * [ ![Twitter Trump](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-reviews-placeholder-3.svg) Credit: @lgbtfeedla 

### Twitter gives users more power to report fakers, as purge continues

](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/twitter-is-giving-users-more-power-to-
report-fake-accounts-as-purge-continues-3613624 "Twitter gives users more
power to report fakers, as purge continues")

  *   * [ ![Amazon Echo Dot \(3rd Gen\) 1 hero](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it

](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-
echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to
enable it")

  * 

Well the name is a dead giveaway for a start. As with previous Nexus devices,
the Nexus 8 – if it exists – will land with an 8-inch (-ish) screen.

The benchmark readout also gives us some clues as to what we can expect from
the device.

For instance, it’s listed as using an octa-core processor clocked at 1.3GHz.
Unfortunately, we don’t know which exact chip features.

The device is also seemingly running on [Android
5.1.1](https://www.trustedreviews.com/opinions/android-5-1-features), however
we’d say it’s far more likely that a new Nexus tablet will actually ship with
[Android 6.0 Marshmallow](https://www.trustedreviews.com/opinions/android-m-
features).

That’s Google’s upcoming update to its mobile operating system, expected to
debut on new Nexus devices this autumn.

**Related:[Best Tablet 2015](https://www.trustedreviews.com/best-
tablets_round-up)**

There’s little else we can extract from this latest leak, so we’ll just have
to wait for an official unveiling from Google.

If the Nexus 8 does exist, it’s likely to land alongside the long-rumoured [LG
Nexus 5 (2015)](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/lg-nexus-5-2015-release-
date-rumours-news-specs-and-price) and [Huawei Nexus 6
(2015)](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/huawei-nexus-6-2015-release-date-
rumours-news-specs-price).

Would you like to see an 8-inch tablet from Google? Tell us why in the
comments.
